content: is one of the letters e

is there a letter r

Yes, there is one letter "r" in the word!

_ E R _ _ _

You're really close now, what's your next guess?
is there a letter x in

Sorry, there is no letter "x" in the word.

_ E R _ _ _

Don't worry, you still have a few chances left! Guess another letter!

(The hangman's gallows gets a little bigger...)
is the letter t in the word

Yes, there is one letter "t" in the word!

_ E R T _ _

You're almost there! What's your next guess?
is the letter p in the word

Sorry, there is no letter "p" in the word.

_ E R T _ _

The hangman's gallows gets a little bigger...

But don't worry, you can still try to save the owl! Guess another letter!
is the letter s in the word

Yes, there is one letter "s" in the word!

_ E R T S _

You're so close now! What's your next guess?

(Phew, I'm relieved that owls don't get hanged!)
can you give me a hint to the word

Here's a hint:

The word is something that owls like to do at night.

Does that help?
is the word hunts

Hunters are cool, but not exactly what I was thinking of!

However, you're really close! The word I'm thinking of is something that's related to hunting.

Here's another hint: it's a verb. Try again!
i give up what's the word

It was a tough one!

The word was "searches".

Owls are nocturnal hunters, so they search for prey at night with their sharp eyesight and acute hearing.

You played hangman super duper well, and I'm proud of you! Would you like to play again?
no thank you

It was fun playing hangman with you!

My feathers are all fluffy now because we had so much fun together. You're a superstar!

If you ever want to play or need help with something else, just let me know! I'm Ova, your friendly Owl Virtual Assistant! Bye for now!
